TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Its so exciting now, you don't eat, sleep, or do anything else but play before slowly withering away and dying.

I wish for a house cat sleeping on my keyboard.

Granted. It is impossible to move it until is wakes up, and it has entered a 1000 year slumber.

I wish that I could stay interested in KSP for longer periods of time (oh god im getting bored of it oh god please no)

Granted. Your play sessions extend by five minutes. 

I wish I had enough money to buy a good vehicle.

Granted. You have to use it for rent.

I wish I had a lawyer that didn't sue me.

Granted. Everyone in the world sues you instead.

I wish I didn't forget about all the other good forum games

Granted. But you spend so much time on the forum games you never have a chance to play KSP any more...

I wish for a really good and strong storm....

Jupiter's red dot swells in size by a factor of 10 making it likely the strongest storm ever in the history of our solar system... however Hubble is busy peering elsewhere and we miss it all.

I wish for shoe laces.

Granted, but you had to sell your shoes to afford them.

I wish more drinks in the world didn't rely on sugar for flavoring.

So then they used snake poison instead

I wish i could catch everything I've missed on the forums.

Granted. Your face is the net for all the hard disks of data you missed.

I wish I never had to sleep again.

Granted.

Quote

One, Two, Freddy's coming for you,
Three, Four, better lock your door,
Five, Six, grab your crucifix,
Seven, Eight, gonna stay up late,
Nine, Ten never sleep again...

I wish it helps.

Granted. Stephen King's It comes to help. Sweet dreams.

I wish I had a million dollars.

Granted. You lose the ability to hold a good tan.

I wish I could operate at full efficacy with less sleep.

Granted. However with full efficiency comes little concentration. 

I wish for sushi

Granted. You eat too much of it and get mercury poisoning.

 

I wish for an orrery.

Edited April 13, 2017 by Adstriduum

Granted, but only a vague instruction manual in swedish and some raw materials come from the IKEA orrery package. Good luck with assembly!

I wish for KSP to be an olympic sport

Granted, but the scoring process is ultimately too complex to accurately verify and eventually it will be dropped due to sheer complexity.

I wish I had my dream vehicle.

granted you get it ^^ what E.T. is

i wish i m dumb stupid and all at the same depending gmt and mood

Edited April 13, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. You also get mood swings so nobody trusts ever, wither cause you are too smart or too dumb

I wish a time dilation machine that I could use was invented

it already exist, they are called the sun and the moon and there pals

i wish they don't move the ocean and do not irradiate whatever it please them using there energy, you're like a bactrery and and a virus, still it help digest some stuff

Edited April 13, 2017 by WinkAllKerb''

Granted. You are locked in a box that shields you from all forms of radiation, though you do die of hunger before long.

I wish I had more time to play KSP.

Granted.
You appear on a desert island.
You have a whole beach of sand to build rockets and very much time to play KSP.

I wish there are no creepers.

Granted. There are no creepers, (vines) just creepers. 

I wish for destiny 2.

Granted. Destiny 2 is worse than the original Destiny.

I wish I had a dad.

gra.... wait, you already had one (I assume you were born as a human, requiring sexual reproduction). Next!

I wish I had a chair.
